dashboard.title: Analytics Overview
dashboard.description: Comprehensive insights from {{count}}+ AI tools — including trends, pricing models, and market distribution.
dashboard.info1: This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into the AI tools ecosystem, including category distributions, pricing models, technology trends, and more.
dashboard.info2: Interact with the visualizations to explore the data in detail. Use filters and hover over charts for more information.
